title: Fresh strawberry scones
ingredients: ['150g ripe strawberries - cleaned, hulled and diced', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '4 tablespoons single cream', '250g plain flour', '60g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 1/2 teaspoons lemon zest', '85g cold unsalted butter']
